function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Incorporate contagion risk models into route calculation algorithms to prioritize safer paths over shorter distances.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of robust cybersecurity measures, regular security audits, and user education on data security best practices.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Provide justification for changes in diagnostic methods and verify accuracy of diagnosis","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Thorough testing and validation of the model equations, as well as peer review by experts in the field, can help reduce the risk of inaccuracies.","category":"Validation of model predictions through experimental methods","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Validation and peer review of the mathematical models, transparent documentation of assumptions and limitations","category":"Validation of model predictions through experimental methods","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Strict adherence to data protection regulations and privacy laws. transparent communication and consent processes for individuals being scanned.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Enhanced data privacy measures, validation of ai diagnosis with traditional testing methods","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Validation of ai diagnosis with traditional testing methods, data encryption and secure storage","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Validation of voice detection accuracy against other testing methods, regular updates and improvements to the technology.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continuous monitoring and improvement of ai algorithms, collaboration with virology research for mutation detection.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Thorough validation and testing of drug candidates, collaboration with medical experts for verification.","category":"Medical treatments","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Thorough validation of ai-generated drug candidates through rigorous testing and clinical trials","category":"Medical treatments","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting comprehensive studies and trials to validate the effectiveness of repurposed drugs","category":"Medical treatments","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure rigorous scientific checks and clinical trials before approval of treatments","category":"Medical treatments","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Balance ai-driven discovery with traditional research methods, encourage diverse research approaches","category":"Introduce \"multi-use\" / modular designs","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Conducting experimental verification of predictions","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Validation of model predictions through experimental methods","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Explore alternative data sources, develop robust ai models, and address data quality possible contingencies","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement transparent and accountable governance frameworks for the use of ai in public health surveillance, and provide clear communication about the purpose and limitations of ai surveillance","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Invest in interdisciplinary collaboration between ai researchers and domain experts in public health, and develop ai systems that can autonomously adapt and learn from new information","category":"Facilitate transparent
